name: sw london I views are my own

content.html: I love when job vacancies claim they have a great benefits scheme when their benefits are listed like this: •28 Days Holiday •Sick leave •Maternity leave •Pension scheme •1 hour lunch break These aren’t benefits babe. You’ve listed mandatory UK law. You have 0 benefits.
content.value:
I love when job vacancies claim they have a great benefits scheme when their benefits are listed like this:

•28 Days Holiday
•Sick leave 
•Maternity leave
•Pension scheme
•1 hour lunch break 

These aren’t benefits babe. You’ve listed mandatory UK law. You have 0 benefits.
